Description: A: pendant in the shape of a poppy seed, made of carnelian, the neck with perforation is broken off. B: one larger bead made of bone, roughly cylindrical in shape with rounded edges. C: two disc-shaped beads, one of ostrich eggshell in a slightly smaller size and fritt?/faience in a turquoise colour.
Acquisition notes: Formerly housed by the Birmingham Museum and Art Gallery and the EES London.
